refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: flag = assert_checktrue ( condition ) flag = assert_checktrue ( condition ) [flag,errmsg] = assert_checktrue ( condition )

listitem.para: a 1x1 matrix of boolean, %t if computed is close to expected, %f if not
a 1x1 matrix of strings, the error message. If flag==%t, then errormsg=="". If flag==%f, then errmsg contains the error message.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Performs silently if all entries in condition are true.
Generates an error if any entry in the condition matrix is false. Generates an error if the condition variable is not a boolean.
